title: Justin Bieber is trying to sell his Miami mansion through Instagram
text:
Justin Bieber is trying to sell his house through Instagram because he can (Picture: Gotham/GC Images)

Celebrities are known to bounce from one mansion to another when they get feel the need to switch things up, and Justin Bieber decided he doesn’t need estate agents to help him sell his Miami home.

Yep, the pop superstar took matters into his own hands on Friday when he posted more than ten pictures and videos showing off his impressive mansion in a bid to tempt someone else to buy it from him.

The pop superstar – who just married his boo Hailey Baldwin in a lavish second ceremony – took the world on a mini tour of his spacious property as he shared his ‘home vibes’ with the world.

‘Home vibes, but I wanna sell it I think anyone interested?,’ he wrote alongside one snap.

‘I think I wanna sell my home in Beverly Hills who wants it,’ he explained in another caption.

Advertisement

Advertisement

And JB make it clear just how easy he was willing to make the transaction as he added: ‘I’ll sell it with all the furniture . MAKE AN OFFER.’

The singer loves his home but he’s in the mood to sell it, apparently (Picture: Justin Bieber/Instagram)

Caption: JB house for sale

(Picture: @justinbieber)

The pop superstar took matters into his own hands on Friday by showing the home off on social media (Picture: Justin Bieber/Instagram)

Whoever takes JB up on his offer could even persuade him to let them keep the blown up picture of the singer and his model wife that can be seen in a zen sitting area within the home.

Or maybe they might be tempted by the star’s arcade game collection which includes Super Shot.

The Miami mansion is pretty spacious (Picture: Justin Bieber/Instagram)

The online tour gave a fans a peek into Justin’s world (Picture: Justin Bieber/Instagram)

The singer’s wife Hailey is yet to comment on Justin’s sale tactic (Picture: Justin Bieber/Instagram)

*Feet not included (Picture: Justin Bieber/Instagram)

The star even has a large collection of skateboards hanging up on the wall by one of his staircases, alongside his collection of Kaws Companion action figures.

JB’s wifey Hailey hasn’t make a comment about the house sale yet but maybe the pair will add the extra cash from any potential sale to their honeymoon fund.

Justin said he’d include all the furniture, but didn’t say what will happen to his art collection (Picture: Justin Bieber/Instagram)

His photography wasn’t the best but it does the job (Picture: Justin Bieber/Instagram)

The singer will even include some of his arcade games in the deal (Picture: Justin Bieber/Instagram)

Sources have told People magazine that the couple are ‘forgoing an immediate honeymoon’. They said: ‘For Justin and Hailey, every day is like a honeymoon.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘They are both fine with [not having anything planned],’ the source said, adding that Justin is instead ‘very focused’ on his new music.

The Baby hitmaker is in the midst of dropping a new album and recently revealed that fans are likely to get their hands on his new release this year.

Justin hasn’t blessed us with a new album for four years, but has got in the studio for a string of collaborations, including I Don’t Care, with Ed Sheeran, Billie Eilish’s Bad Guy, and recently dropped 10,000 Hours with Dan + Shay.

Got a showbiz story? If you've got a story, video or pictures get in touch with the Metro.co.uk Entertainment team by emailing us celebtips@metro.co.uk, calling 020 3615 2145 or by visiting our Submit Stuff page - we'd love to hear from you.

description: Justin Bieber posted more than ten pictures on Instagram to show off his mansion in a bid to tempt someone else to buy it from him.
